Text: hey my screen is zoomed out so the game window is really small, i don't see an options selection anywhere. any ideas on how to adjust the game size?
try CMD + to zoom in, CMD - to zoom out, CMD F to toggle full screen or window mode (if you're already in full screen)...

thank you..i tried that....i get a "full screen" when i hit command f but its still really small theres a couple inches of black frame around the game the game is a tiny square in the middle of the screen, is that how small its supposed to be?

oh i got it..you are the best!! i was doing the wrong thing i was hitting up instead of plus lol thank you!! i legit wouldn't have known how to do that, i was dying to check out this game, i love every one of your uploads, i look forward to seeing more. thanks WinterGale!
